mapper.select: SELECT A.VNO , B.TNAME , C.DAY FROM VETERINARIAN A JOIN TREATMENT_TYPE B ON (A.TNO = B.TNO) JOIN HOLIDAY C ON (A.VNO = C.VNO) ORDER BY A.VNO
SELECT A.VNO , A.VNAME , B.TNO , B.TNAME , C.DAY FROM VETERINARIAN A JOIN TREATMENT_TYPE B ON (A.TNO = B.TNO) JOIN HOLIDAY C ON (A.VNO = C.VNO) WHERE A.TNO = #{tno}
SELECT A.DOG_NAME , A.DOG_AGE , A.BREED , A.DOG_GENDER FROM DOG_INFORMATION A JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE B.USER_ID = #{ id }
